comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Based on your trust rating I do not think anyone will hire you on this profile. You may post on this profile the bounty campaign which will be considered as a scam or probable scam which project you will get from your main account (If you have any). But you will not be able to get any good campaign on your profile.Reason:1. Negative trust2. Ban Evason3. Multi account4. Lower rankand so on.
